TopicTitle: Game is unplayable due to bug

Articles.Content:
So, I started a new career recently and am now quite far in it. But I'm having a problem that makes the game unplayable. After launching a craft, the view goes black. I better show a screenshot for explanation.

![qL6QAPll.png](http://i.imgur.com/qL6QAPll.png)

I know, there was such a problem before, but I don't want go trough 200 threads to find it.I also put my Gamedata and player.log up.

![NS8nbkY.png](http://i.imgur.com/NS8nbkY.png)

Download the log [here.](https://www.dropbox.com/s/cbtkjvlat782pag/Player.log.new.bug.log?dl=0)

I had the same thing happen to me - I only had Kerbal Engineer and MechJeb installed at the time. I uninstalled and reinstalled KE and it hasn't happened since (knock on wood). I have since installed used CKAN to monitor my mod installations and it is great for letting me know conflicts or updates to mods. [https://github.com/KSP-CKAN/CKAN/](https://github.com/KSP-CKAN/CKAN/)

I hope this helps and good luck.

Strange, this bug only occurs when I launch a specific craft. It works fine when I remove stage recovery.

Edit:

Nope, re-installing Kerbal Engineer didn't help.
